definitions.definition: a process in which unwanted facial hair is removed by using twisted cotton thread to pull the hair from the follicle.
the system by which consecutive messages relating to a single subject on a message board or newsgroup are stored for retrieval.
pass a thread through the eye of (a needle) or through the needle and guides of (a sewing machine).
pass (a long, thin object or piece of material) through something and into the required position for use.
examples: he threaded the rope through a pulley
synonyms: poke More"he threaded the rope through a pulley"weave
make "she threaded her way through the tables"

definitions.definition: move carefully or skillfully in and out of obstacles.
examples: she threaded her way through the tables

definitions.definition: interweave or intersperse as if with threads.
examples: his hair had become ill-kempt and threaded with gray

definitions.definition: put (beads, chunks of food, or other small objects) together or singly on a thread, chain, or skewer that runs through the center of each one.
synonyms: poke "he threaded the rope through a pulley"

definitions.definition: cut a screw thread in or on (a hole, screw, or other object).
